Name: New Yorker
Ingredients: 12.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rich bourbon, red wine tannins and sour zesty citrus brought together and balanced by a touch of sugar.
Nutrition: One serving of New Yorker contains 210 calories
